verses.text: Ayton val swach'k'olal Dios t'ayonh a onh israel onh tik, mach onh tojol yaj co pensar.
Ixocto val yak' jab'ocxo, in telvi. Jab'xonhej maj in b'atcan t'a skal chucal,
yujto ix viloch in k'ol t'a eb' ak'umtac yet' eb' anima chuc ayic ix vilani to te wach'nhej yaj eb'.
Malaj chamel sja t'a yib'anh eb' svila'. Tek'an yaj eb', malaj syab' syail snivanil eb'.
Malaj yaelal sja t'a yib'anh eb'. Malaj stzapan majanil eb' sja t'a yib'anh.
Yuj chi' te wach' syutej eb' sb'oan sb'a yuj sch'oxanel yak'umtaquil yet' pax yixtan anima.
Ijan val maxtzac checlaj yol sat eb' yuj sb'aq'uechal. Yelxo val te chuc spensar eb'.
B'uchumtac slolon eb', syik'chaanh sb'a eb'. Malaj jab'oc sq'uixvelal eb' yak'an oval, syixtan anima eb'.
Anhej b'uchval lolonel syal eb' d'ha Dios aj satcha’anh. Syalanpax chuc eb' t'a anima t'a sat lu'um tik.
Yuj chi' tz'och tzak'an eb' anima yuj eb', schaan yab' eb' anima chi' jantac chucal syal eb'.
Snaan eb' icha tik: ¿Tas ol yutoc Dios Ek'to t'a yib'anh smasanil yojtacanel tas sco k'ulej tik? ¿Tocval syil tas tzuji tik? xchi eb'.
Ilecnab' val juntzanh anima chuc tik, malaj tas tz'ik'an eb', ste q'uib'nhej chaanh sb'eyumal eb'.
Palta a inxo tik, malaj tas ix vak' ganar wach'chom ix in yamoch vaan in pensar t'a chucal, wach'chom wach' ix vutej in b'eyb'al.
Cotac skal tz'ak'ji in yaelal, ichato tzin mak'ji. Junjun q'uinhib'alil svik'an tz'uum.
Mamin, q'uinaloc ix val icha syal eb' chi', ix am vixtej eb' vetchonhab', a onh ton a chonhab' onh tik.
Ix snib'ej in k'ool to snachajel jun tik vuuj, palta tonhej ix somchaj in pensar yuj.
Ato val yic ix in och t'a a cajnub', ichato chi' ix nachajel vuuj tas ol cotcan t'a yib'anh eb' chuc chi'.
Toxo ix aq'uem linhan eb' t'a yax nhelek'tac yic stelvi eb'. Tzecancanb'at eb' b'aj ol ixtaxoc.
Elanhchamel ol aj satel eb'. D'a skal xivk'olal ol lajvoccanel eb'.
Ach Mamin Vajalil, icha tz'aj sat svayich junok mach t'a sk'ool ayic tz'el svayanh, icha chi' ol aj a paticanel eb' chuc chi' ayic ol a naanq'ue tas ol aj eb'.
Ayic manto nachajel-laj jun tik vuuj, ix in te cusi, ix och pitz'an syail t'a in pixan.
Ha yuj in quistalil maj nachajel-laj vuuj, yuj chi' lajan ix vutej in b'ha t'a ichanh icha junok nok' nok' malaj spensar.
Palta jun, ayinnhej ek' ed'oc, quetzb'il in uuj.
Tzin a k'ayb'an t'a tas svutej in b'a. Axo t'a slajvub', ol in a cha t'a a wach'ilal.
Malaj junocxo mach ayek' t'a satcha’anh b'aj svak'och in pensar, a achnhej toni. Ayic snachajel vuuj to ayach ek' ved'oc, manhxalaj tas tzin nib'ejoch t'a sat lu'um tik.
Wach'chom spax yip in nivanil tik, stacpax in k'ool, palta a achxo ach Dios, Vipumal aji, anhej t'ayach ay masanil tas snib'ej in k'ool.
Ha eb' syiq'uel sb'a t'ayach, ol cham eb'. Ol a satel masanil eb' syiq'uel sb'a chi'.
Palta a in val tik Mamin Jehová Vajalil, tzin nitzoch in b'ha t'a a tz'ey yujto anhej jun chi' niwan yelk'och t'ayin. Tzach vak'och yipoc in k'ool yic svalel jantac tas ix a k'ulej.
